item.title: Client TLS Connections in Golang
item.description: TLS has always been a bit of a mystery to me. I understand how it works from a high level, but when it comes to the internal workings of it I have no clue. Hence, when an issue for my Golang Neo4j Bolt Driver project turned out to be related to lack of TLS support, I decided it would be a great subject for a post. The issue stated that the connection wasnâ€™t working to GrapheneDB and that it was using a non-TLS connection.
